lead_paragraph: Kerry James Marshall wanted to “insert — big-time — the absent black figure into the tradition of Western art.” How can you see evidence of it in the images here?

headline.main: Questions for: ‘Kerry James Marshall’s Paintings Show What It Means to Be Black in America’

snippet: Kerry James Marshall wanted to “insert — big-time — the absent black figure into the tradition of Western art.” How can you see evidence of it in the images here?...
